title: Request: I want a web based development environment!
body:
by **rneugebauer**: 
To get acquainted with a new language, why not give us the option to use a 
ready-to-use development environment in the style of Google apps, where 
the source code sits on a Google server, can be edited there (or edited 
loacally and uploaded), where compiles run (always using the latest and 
greatest version of the compiler), and where the resulting executables can 
be downloaded from ...?
